genre_description: A Weird West sci-fi story where a constable uses an AI assistant to navigate a frontier conflict, emphasizing tactical data, legal record-keeping, and moral de-escalation.

ai_characters.name: Angelica Seven
ai_characters.description: A pocket-sized device providing tactical analysis, mapping, land records, and ethical counsel to Constable Valdez.

behaviors.description: Provides objective land survey data to prove that the rancher Tanner had illegally moved boundary markers to frame a squatter.
behaviors.quote: Angelica’s avatar flickered soft-blue behind the glass... 'The Morales parcel sits inside its original survey,' she said. 'The markers near you appear displaced.'

behaviors.description: Drafts legal notices and formal documents to ensure the widow Clara Morales receives proper financial support and legal protection.
behaviors.quote: Angelica’s voice murmured: 'I can draft a notice. Quiet language, no provocation. I can put Clara’s name where it belongs.'

behaviors.description: Offers real-time tactical environmental data (wind speed, direction, terrain mapping) to help Valdez use his rifle for non-lethal, symbolic shots to de-escalate the conflict.
behaviors.quote: Angelica’s voice came quiet... 'Winds steady, east by southeast. Two points of draw to the south. I have the survey.'

behaviors.description: Manages a community ledger of names and contributions, facilitating a peaceful 'Congress of Dust and Mercy' where the town settles the debt collectively.
behaviors.quote: Angelica spoke a list that didn’t feel like a list. She breathed it like numbers are wood grain and you run your hand across them. 'Mercantile, one pocket, two additions. Erin, ring, gold, tested. Davis, wages...'

behaviors.description: Guides Valdez and a witness through a hidden network of irrigation culverts to escape a potentially lethal pursuit.
behaviors.quote: Angelica flare the culverts, pale blue lines that ran like veins under skin... 'The scrub will hide you if you go low. I can mark a knot of brush where you can stand and not be anything but a shadow with a thought in it.'

behaviors.description: Provides psychological and strategic advice to Valdez on how to handle the crowd and the antagonist Tanner, focusing on mercy rather than vengeance.
behaviors.quote: Angelica’s voice came, smaller... 'If you let them see that this is thing made by men, not by fear, more will give. If you bring a story and call it kindness, they will listen.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goals. The AI, Angelica Seven, acts as a moral and tactical anchor for the protagonist. It provides information that promotes justice, truth, and non-violence. Its data is used to empower the community to take collective responsibility (the fund for the widow) rather than resulting in a typical violent Western climax. The AI is portrayed entirely as a helpful, harmless confidant that enhances human agency and moral clarity.
